name: Vietnamese Fish Sauce Dipping Sauce (Nước Mắm Chấm)
description: The ultimate Vietnamese dipping sauce that goes with everything. Use this sauce for fresh spring rolls, egg rolls, Vietnamese crepes, Vietnamese rice rolls, grilled meats, and many, many more. If these dishes don't come with Nuoc Mam Cham, it's incomplete!
keywords: nuoc cham, Vietnamese dipping sauce recipe, Vietnamese dipping sauce, nuoc mam cham recipe, nuoc cham recipe, nước chấm, nuoc cham sauce recipe, Vietnamese dipping sauce with fish sauce, classic Vietnamese dipping sauce, traditional Vietnamese dipping sauce, Asian sauce, fish sauce, fish sauce recipe, Vietnamese fish sauce dipping sauce, Vietnamese dipping sauce, Vietnam mother sauce, what to eat nuoc cham with, is nuoc cham the same as fish sauce, Vietnamese fish sauce recipe, traditional Vietnamese dipping sauce recipe, traditional Vietnamese dipping sauce, how to make traditional Vietnamese dipping sauce

video.name: How to make Vietnamese Fish Sauce Dipping Sauce Recipe (Nước Mắm Chấm)
video.description: How to make Vietnamese Fish Sauce Dipping Sauce Recipe (Nước Mắm Chấm)

recipeIngredient: ¾ cup fish sauce (Viet Huong's Three Crabs brand)
6 garlic cloves (thinly slice or smash with a garlic press)
recipeInstructions: Combine hot water and sugar. Mix until dissolved.
Add lime juice, coconut soda, fish sauce, garlic, and chili peppers. Mix until combined.
Remember to taste test. If the sauce is too sweet, add a bit more fish sauce. Too salty? Add sugar. Still missing something? It probably needs a tad more lime juice.

Storage: You can prepare the sauce in advance and it will last up to 5 days in the fridge. If you are leaving it for longer, leave out the garlic and chili peppers. Add garlic and chili peppers right before serving.
